title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct slope

0/1 if m ≤ 0

Note: first type in (a) ok if works in either equation of slope or must commit to value in (a) and use it second type must use value from (a)

1 point is earned for the correct equation and commitment to slope

0/1 bald - no a value in (a)

descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct slope

0/1 if m ≤ 0

Note: first type in (a) ok if works in either equation of slope or must commit to value in (a) and use it second type must use value from (a)

1 point is earned for the correct equation and commitment to slope

0/1 bald - no a value in (a)

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct slope

0/1 if m ≤ 0

Note: first type in (a) ok if works in either equation of slope or must commit to value in (a) and use it second type must use value from (a)

1 point is earned for the correct equation and commitment to slope

0/1 bald - no a value in (a)

1 point is earned for the correct slope

0/1 if m ≤ 0

Note: first type in (a) ok if works in either equation of slope or must commit to value in (a) and use it second type must use value from (a)
